title: IAF, Navy tie up with DRDO to acquire CHAFF to shield warships, fighter aircraft - Hindustan Times
content: IAF, Navy tie up with DRDO to acquire CHAFF to shield warships, fighter aircraft  Hindustan Times
description: CHAFF is a critical defence technology used to protect fighter aircrafts or naval ships from enemy radar-guided missile during war. The significance of this technology lies in the fact that very less quantity of CHAFF material deployed in the air acts as a decoy to deflect enemy's missiles to ensure safety of the fighter aircraft or naval ships.
